title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 65.6 - Price paid by seller
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 65.6 - Price paid by seller

State Regulations
(a) The net
bottle and case price paid by the seller shall mean the last case price paid by
the seller in United States currency after deducting all discounts reflected in
the invoice. (b) It shall not apply
to the following: (1)

To wine items listed in
a schedule. (2)

To any item where
the manufacturer is the seller. (c) In instances where the schedule is filed
by a brand owner who is not the manufacturer of the item listed, the price paid
by the seller may be designated under any one of the following options: the
actual price paid, the landed cost or the unit production cost. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
65.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
